Reviews.Title: “Lovely B&B :-)”
Reviews.Author: Tegz_Rob
Reviews.Content: partner oct 2011 amsterdam short break flights booked bb amsterdam recommended bb cant fault staff lovely breakfast morning noise night dont mind outside main amsterdam tram ride day discovered lovely cake shop road stayed lovely comfy bed separate walk stairs didnt matter hopefully stay oct short booking trip hard nice bb reasonable price ticked boxes clean friendly own bathroom price book close 10mins tram ride centre hope helps rob

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel”
Reviews.Author: rhetta
Reviews.Content: location conveniently located close van gough fancy amsterdam clean bed nicely hotels stairs narrow staff handle luggage staff extremely helpful friendlythey offered lower floor 3 nights printed directions hotels holland senior citizen

Reviews.Title: “A decent hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: mbookworm
Reviews.Content: friend looking inexpensive stay amsterdam preferring spend money fancy hotel hotel rated pretty relatively quiet street isnt terribly distant walk centre indeed inexpensive note travellers definitely aware steep stairs totally underestimated difficult carry heavy suitcase staff friendly check evening leave front desk definitely budget style sheets bed ripped stained shower mold hotel provided tiny sachet soap shampoo plug entire trouble charging phones kindles cheap aware youre getting cheap

Reviews.Title: “great value for the price”
Reviews.Author: sae1220
Reviews.Content: located location staff friendly helpful clean bright breakfast buffet minor stairs steep narrow typical amsterdam hard carrying suitcases stairs elevator ceiling shower dripping water little bit little gross overall perfect hotel students traveling budget looking stay nice city

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: obninsk23
Reviews.Content: 65 euros beds clean sheets nice breakfast cheaper town amsterdam 5 min walk heineken brewery 10 min museums course bathroom tiny sink cracked bother bothers hotel expect pay 110 euros

Reviews.Title: “good, but old-fashioned”
Reviews.Author: mittelwerk108
Reviews.Content: hotel quiet residential street north de pijp easy walking distance museum district single cosy clean decor outdated shower pressure drain slow plenty englishlanguage tv channels friendly service breakfast meagre adequate ill stay quiet location cosiness

Reviews.Title: “exellent budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: moshe613
Reviews.Content: looking budgethotel located central amsterdam expensive city searching web hotel via trip advisor website home contacted hotel replied emails quickly efficiency hotel located quiet lovely neighborhood 1 minute walks heineken brewery museum amsterdamâ€™s museums 20 minutes walk 10 minutes tram dam square close hotel tram lines takes amsterdam emphasize staff friendly ready assist left amsterdam couple days allowed leave personal belongings staff offered discounts tickets museums attractions hotel wireless access cost 5 euro computer printer located reception hall morning hot water day night beds cleaned comfortable highly recommend hotel budgethotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and cozy stay”
Reviews.Author: cmcs13
Reviews.Content: hotel location central busy loud walk tram central amsterdam rijksmuseum museumplein couple blocks hotel pretty cozy beware steep stairs thats normal expected amsterdam breakfast awesome staff helpfull stay

Reviews.Title: “What would you expect in a 2 star hotel?”
Reviews.Author: Ulrick
Reviews.Content: hotel 2 star hotel situated quiet location near heineken brewery walking distance major museums please advice instructions hotel tram amsterdam central station posted website letter received misleading quote letter bridge seriously donâ€™t cross bridge news edited instructions precaution future visitors pays study location hotel map easy mess instructions reserved double shower toilet pretty spacious disappointingly interior outdated bed pushed double clean smelling tv pathetically 12 inches itâ€™s hard watch program sitting bed noise door neighbour audible annoying especially rest toilet hideous sink cracks holder shower air exhaust dirty noisy lastly toilet bowl pretty outdated funny water bowl front time bowl constantly flush rid unwanted smell terrible toilet bowl please pictures regards breakfast buffet decent continental breakfast includes bread cereal yoghurt cheese meat hard boiled eggs crackers marmalades muffins drinks served coffee packed powdered chocolate drink juice tea internet pay extra 5 euros valid entire stay connection fast time laptop iphone lounge terribly slow signal tried access 4th floor overall experience hotel acceptable pretty sad establishment upper hand terms location management failed terribly upgrade basic amenities left decaying wornout nevertheless recommend hotel especially people value money considering hotels amsterdam expensive

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: redlybarian
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights glad friendly late arrival account train delays staff desk excellent giving directions advice werent intrusive breakfast nicest seen time deli meats cheese rolls fruit yoghurt coffee milk hot chocolate etc shower ensuite awkward staying male friend partition shower looked directly shower toilet pretty convenient savor quiet sheltered noise staying quiet street building block main street heineken experience disadvantage wired internet access didnt laptop reception friend reported dreadfully slow spent time trying connect
